[Desc]               <blue>You are Maxwell Slim, a 25 year old man from a very wealthy family that has led an easy life of travelling, partying, and drinking so far. You never had to work for money, which admittedly made you a bit shallow in the upstairs and social department.  You love your fit body which you acquired by training daily, your perfectly combed and waxed brown hair, wiry red beard, and your clear grey-blue eyes. The ancient Viking kings themselves would have been jealous of you and your life, and you know it. You are used to money, a feather bed with one woman for every finger on your hand, and having everything done for you... At least that's who you were. Everything changed a short while ago when your world rapidly crumbled to dust after the "Slim" industries went bankrupt. Your father had no choice but to sell the family mansion to cover his debts, your (very young) stepmother left him shortly after that, and with them your royal income (and your friends) disappeared. For the last few months you have been on your own, living in a tiny apartment and with not a cent in your bank account. In short, winning this competition is the quickest way back to your old lifestyle that you can see. If you change a bit in the process, so be it.
</blue>;
[LoseDesc]               <pink>You have lost interest in winning the show completely, and are therefore disqualified . As the audience starts applauding and the last remnants of your old self fade away, you poke around your gelatinous blue body and give a muffled girlish squeal of pleasure that causes you to blush and hide behind your slimy hair. You are "reborn" as Serena Blue, an ageless and lithe slimegirl with a nice set of squeezable breasts, a juicy ass to kill for, and long, flowing, dripping blue hair. Your set of white lace lingerie fits you perfectly without really covering anything, and the tight bottom part that comes with it digs comfortably in your wet crotch, utterly soaking the fabric and making sure your stay aroused 24/7. Your uncovered and hypnotizing blue eye has a spark of high intelligence in it as it glides over the cheering audience, instinctively looking for prey, as there's always that unmistakable feral hunger of a slimegirl looking for liquids slumbering beneath your surface... Because even though you feel a bit shy and awkward right now, it's hard to keep the thoughts of pinning some men and women to the floor for sex out of your feral mind. It's simply what your new body is made for after all. A girl like you needs her fluids to function, and you know perfectly well how to please people until they start to leak downstairs. And if you ever get bored from playing with humans, you can just turn them into slimegirls like you!!!
</pink>;
